results.name: Periodic sequence with period 2 2 0 -2 -2 0.
comment: Sequence is identical to its third differences.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,-1).
mathematica: PadRight[{},120,{2,2,0,-2,-2,0}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{1,-1},{2,2},120] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 13 2014 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[2,2]; [n le 2 select I[n] else Self(n-1) - Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 04 2018
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Jul 14 2007
